abilities.name: Dual Armor
abilities.effect: As long as Rocket's Scyther ex has any Grass Energy attached to it, Rocket's Scyther ex is both Grass and Darkness type."

attacks.name: Bounce
attacks.effect: After your attack, you may switch Rocket's Scyther ex with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slashing Strike
attacks.effect: Rocket's Scyther ex can't use Slashing Strike during your next turn.
